entry.title: UR A Game Bug
entry.content:
Last night , we were both working util 9pm as usual , you finished your job half past 8pm , then take No.94 bus coming to take me home :), I gave you a threaten when I downstaires , because you were playing game , you rushed through the street when the traffic light is dying , you are not only cute but also seems like a shit ~( Maybe also smell like a shit) stand still as long as you just across the street , you are so concentrate on it that you did not find the traffic light turning green .

Anyway , Loveu My LJKF .

YOU ARE ALWAYS A GAME BUG .
